4475.verse: تَنزِيلُ|(The) revelation|127|137|13868$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(of) the Book|108|128|811$مِنَ|(is) from|76|96|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|73|606$ٱلْعَزِيزِ|the All-Mighty,|118|138|3257$ٱلْحَكِيمِ|the All-Wise.|105|115|2939$

4476.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|77|58$فِى|in|48|62|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|129|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|125|352$لَأَيَـٰتٍ|surely (are) Signs|137|151|1434$لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|for the believers.|133|140|923$

4477.verse: وَفِى|And in|62|77|487$خَلْقِكُمْ|your creation|108|137|15629$وَمَا|and what|82|111|46$يَبُثُّ|He disperses|103|132|15630$مِن|of|50|79|53$دَآبَّةٍ|(the) moving creatures|173|188|1429$ءَايَـٰتٌ|(are) Signs|93|184|2618$لِّقَوْمٍ|for a people|99|281|1100$يُوقِنُونَ|who are certain.|129|220|50$

4478.verse: وَٱخْتِلَـٰفِ|And (in the) alternation|176|183|1417$ٱلَّيْلِ|(of) the night|110|125|1418$وَٱلنَّهَارِ|and the day|100|115|1419$وَمَآ|and what|82|97|46$أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah sends down|134|149|863$مِنَ|from|50|57|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|95|157$مِن|of|50|72|53$رِّزْقٍ|(the) provision|117|139|8201$فَأَحْيَا|and gives life|107|129|10017$بِهِ|thereby|71|93|204$ٱلْأَرْضَ|(to) the earth|113|135|197$بَعْدَ|after|52|63|1117$مَوْتِهَا|its death,|84|90|1426$وَتَصْرِيفِ|and (in) directing of|152|164|1430$ٱلرِّيَـٰحِ|(the) winds|96|108|1431$ءَايَـٰتٌ|(are) Signs|93|105|2618$لِّقَوْمٍ|for a people|99|111|1100$يَعْقِلُونَ|who reason.|101|107|1435$

4479.verse: تِلْكَ|These|60|66|1038$ءَايَـٰتُ|(are the) Verses,|134|146|2243$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|93|606$نَتْلُوهَا|We recite them|122|134|2244$عَلَيْكَ|to you|71|83|2245$بِٱلْحَقِّ‌ۖ|in truth.|78|90|692$فَبِأَىِّ|Then in what|107|113|7041$حَدِيثِۭ|statement|88|118|4559$بَعْدَ|after|52|112|1117$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|114|606$وَءَايَـٰتِهِۦ|and His Verses|117|178|7707$يُؤْمِنُونَ|will they believe?|133|163|35$

4482.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|95|96$عَلِمَ|he knows|82|101|6936$مِنْ|of|50|69|53$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Verses,|97|116|1344$شَيْــًٔا|anything,|82|101|472$ٱتَّخَذَهَا|he takes them|115|134|15633$هُزُوًا‌ۚ|(in) ridicule.|99|109|659$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those -|82|132|51$لَهُمْ|for them|76|175|98$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|234|72$مُّهِينٌ|humiliating.|94|144|872$

4483.verse: مِّن وَرَآئِهِمْ|Before them|128|139|15634$جَهَنَّمُ‌ۖ|(is) Hell|70|92|1813$وَلَا|and not|71|93|25$يُغْنِى|will avail|75|97|8150$عَنْهُم|them|66|88|2643$مَّا|what|53|75|262$كَسَبُواْ|they had earned|129|140|1788$شَيْــًٔا|anything,|82|92|472$وَلَا|and not|71|91|25$مَا|what|53|73|262$ٱتَّخَذُواْ|they had taken|121|141|4600$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|121|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|73|2$أَوْلِيَآءَ‌ۖ|(as) protectors.|126|136|2754$وَلَهُمْ|And for them|106|196|71$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|314|72$عَظِيمٌ|great.|75|165|73$

4484.verse: هَـٰذَا|This|59|70|248$هُدًى‌ۖ|(is) guidance.|111|134|33$وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|142|42$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|107|59$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|in (the) Verses|119|142|609$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord,|118|130|54$لَهُمْ|for them|76|111|98$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|204|72$مِّن|of|50|119|53$رِّجْزٍ|filth,|69|138|14194$أَلِيمٌ|painful.|68|103|93$

4485.verse: ۞ ٱللَّهُ|Allah|97|104|123$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|148|138$سَخَّرَ|subjected|85|99|9907$لَكُمُ|to you|63|77|196$ٱلْبَحْرَ|the sea|75|89|493$لِتَجْرِىَ|that may sail|106|120|9623$ٱلْفُلْكُ|the ships|80|87|13759$فِيهِ|therein|66|74|32$بِأَمْرِهِۦ|by His Command,|133|148|1031$وَلِتَبْتَغُواْ|and that you may seek|173|188|9913$مِن|of|50|65|53$فَضْلِهِۦ|His Bounty|90|105|866$وَلَعَلَّكُمْ|and that you may|138|146|1341$تَشْكُرُونَ|give thanks.|105|105|508$

4486.verse: وَسَخَّرَ|And He has subjected|165|171|9315$لَكُم|to you|63|75|207$مَّا|whatever|82|94|262$فِى|(is) in|58|70|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|127|351$وَمَا|and whatever|111|123|46$فِى|(is) in|58|64|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth -|94|108|100$جَمِيعًا|all|78|105|300$مِّنْهُ‌ۚ|from Him.|82|109|571$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|97|58$فِى|in|48|75|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|91|28$لَأَيَـٰتٍ|surely are Signs|125|139|1434$لِّقَوْمٍ|for a people|99|316|1100$يَتَفَكَّرُونَ|who give thought.|141|358|7010$

4475.verse: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

4476.verse: Indeed, within the heavens and earth are signs for the believers.

4477.verse: And in the creation of yourselves and what He disperses of moving creatures are signs for people who are certain [in faith].

4478.verse: And [in] the alternation of night and day and [in] what Allah sends down from the sky of provision and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and [in His] directing of the winds are signs for a people who reason.

4479.verse: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you in truth. Then in what statement after Allah and His verses will they believe?

4481.verse: Who hears the verses of Allah recited to him, then persists arrogantly as if he had not heard them. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.

4482.verse: And when he knows anything of Our verses, he takes them in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.

4483.verse: Before them is Hell, and what they had earned will not avail them at all nor what they had taken besides Allah as allies. And they will have a great punishment.

4484.verse: This [Qur'an] is guidance. And those who have disbelieved in the verses of their Lord will have a painful punishment of foul nature.

4485.verse: It is Allah who subjected to you the sea so that ships may sail upon it by His command and that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.

4486.verse: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth - all from Him. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
